# Configuration

Customize your PXL Web Vagrant environment by copying config.default.yaml to config.yaml and modify.

cp config.default.yaml config.yaml

# config.yaml

vm:
    name: pxl-web-vagrant
    ip: 192.168.88.99
    memory: auto
    cpus: 1
    locale:
        timezone: UTC
        language-iso: en_US
    provision:
        show-command: true
        show-command-output: false
        show-command-execution-time: true
        show-command-exit-code: false
        abort-on-error: false
        upgrade-apt: true
    home-dir: /vagrant/projects
    projects-dir: /vagrant/projects
    backup-on-destroy: true
web-servers:
    apache:
        enabled: true
        port:
            http: 7001
            https: 7002
    nginx:
        enabled: false
        port:
            http: 8001
            https: 8002
code:
    php:
        versions:
            - 7.3
            - 7.2
            - 7.1
            - 7.0
            - 5.6
        modules:
        cache:
            memcached:
                enabled: true
            apc:
                enabled: true
        xdebug:
            enabled: true
databases:
    mysql:
        enabled: true
        version: 5.7
        phpmyadmin: true
    postgresql:
        enabled: false
cache:
    redis:
        enabled: false
shell:
    tmux:
        enabled: true
        version: 2.8
        tmuxinator:
            enabled: true
            auto-start: home
        gpakosz:
            enabled: true
            statusbar-title: PXL Web Vagrant
    liquidprompt:
        enabled: true

# Options

# debug

Debug mode.

Default: false

# timezone

Vagrant timezone. See available timezones.

Default: UTC

# language-iso

Vagrant language ISO code. See available country codes

Default: en_US

# vm

# name

Name of Vagrant environment.

Default: pxl-web-vagrant

# memory

Amount of memory usage.

Default: 1024

# cpus

Number of CPU:s used.

Default: 1

# provision

# show-command

Show executed commands during provision.

Default: true

# show-command-execution-time

Show command execution times during provision.

Default: true

# network

# ip

The Vagrant environment IP address.

Default: 192.168.1.99

# web-servers

# apache

# enabled

Enable Apache.

Default: true

# port

Apache port.

Default: 7001

# nginx

# enabled

Enable NGINX.

Default: true

# port

NGINX port.

Default: 7002

# code

# php

# versions

Specify which PHP versions to install.

Default:

- 7.3
- 7.2
- 7.1
- 7.0
- 5.6
# modules

Specify which extra PHP modules to install.

Example:

- gzip

# cache

# memcached
# enabled

Enable Memcached.

Default: true

# apc
# enabled

Enable APC.

Default: true

# databases

# mysql

# enabled

Enable MySQL.

Default: true

# cache

# redis

# enabled

Enable Redis.

Default: true

# shell

# tmux

# enabled

Enable tmux.

Default: true

# version

Specify tmux version.

Default: 2.8

# tmuxinator
# enabled

Enable tmuxinator.

Default: true

# gpakosz
# enabled

Enable gpakosz.

Default: true

# liquidprompt

# enabled

Enable Liquid Prompt.

Default: true
